籤詩版本二:
Mentingji yana farin ciki sosai, kuma ƙofar ayyukan alheri tana da wadata.
Duk al'amura suna tafiya daidai a fagen aure, kuma idan cuta ta sami magani mai ban mamaki, za ku sami lafiya
詩意:
Wannan hexagram yana wakiltar mafarkin bazara tare da ɗaruruwan furanni.
Komai yana da kyau idan kun hadu da mutum mai daraja.

(Wannan hexagram alama ce ta kyakkyawan biki.
Komai yana tafiya lafiya.
)
解曰: Spring yana da zurfi kuma rana tana da dumi. Furen furanni suna fure da kansu. Kada ku yi shakka. Bayyana daga mutane.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Ranar haifuwar Guo Fenyang
Guo Ziyi, babban Janar na Daular Tang kuma Sarkin Fenyang, ya gudanar da bikin ranar haihuwa. Yan uwa da abokan arziki sun zo taya murna, kuma yanayin ya cika da murna da annashuwa.
聖意: Gidan iyali ya wadata, zaman lafiya ya wadata, arziki ya wadata, sana’a ta ci gaba, zaman aure ya yi nasara, Liujia ta hana abin mamaki, masu tafiya zuwa gona, tsutsotsi na siliki sun wadata, an wadata dabbobi, an samu mutane, ana shari’a. nasara, hijira ta yi nasara, ana neman bata cikin gaggawa, cututtuka Anshan, kabari yayi sa'a
第X籤: Na Sittin da Takwas: Nasarar Lottery (Lottery)
